attributes.action: We want more youth spaces where young people can feel safe
attributes.background: We would like the government to put more funding into safe spaces for young people as the numbers of young people turning to crime is rising and the number of young people who feel unsafe is very high and we feel that youth-specific spaces can help to lower this

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610248
